statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({4.23}+{7.74}\right)}={23.94}\approx{23.94}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{7.74}\cdot{4.07}={31.5018}\approx{31.5}.
